name: Future Cat Sailor
description:
~128 Leagues Under The Sea~

Play as the intrepid Future Cat, on a quest for wealth with which to feed his family. Boat and Platform around the haunting ruins of civilizations past.  But will he be able to escape with his life!?!?!

This game was made for Sylvie Jam #1, and as such followed the very specific rules that jam mandated. Check out the other entries too!

This game obviously uses assets from many other works. A full sample list / inspirations post / post mortum will come a little while after release in the form of a devlog, so stay tuned.

Features
  • A sprawling open world
  • 4 unique endings
  • 26 NPCs, with clever little things to say
  • 300+ coins. Can you collect them all? I actually don't even know!
  • 5 original songs, and a couple stolen ones
  • Secrets!
  • Themes!
  • Motifs!
  • Vibes!
  • And More!
Controls
  •  R resets the game, in case you get stuck (a very real possibility)
  • M mutes the music, in case you want to appreciate the ambience, or you get sick of it.
  • L disables the wiggly effect
  • The rest is too much to explain, so you'll have to figure it out for yourself!

Let me know your high scores, what endings you find, what secrets you discover, who your favourite cat is, etc, in the comments below!
